# Lens of Detection
## Overview
**Aura** moderate divination; **CL** 9th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 3,500 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This circular prism lets its user detect minute details, granting a +5 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks. It also aids in tracking, adding a +5 competence bonus on [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] checks when tracking. The lens is about 6 inches in diameter and set in a frame with a handle.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*

**Cost** 1,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 522
